text: 3.3: Ais 40.3; Mk 1.3; Ru 1.76; Zo 1.23Zon, ana mba fhum Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma Aisaia bun suaŋgi guma ma. Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma Aisaia, ana bun nzuav khaŋ suaŋgi, “Guma the gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen kɨv khaŋ suanga, ‘Nde Fhe Bakɨme suaŋv tuavi muuŋri. Nde ana suaŋv tuavir muuŋrim, nta thɨgar maaŋri.’ ”
